The twin moons of Mars are named  after the Greek gods Phobos and Deimos, 
meaning Fear and Terror, they are male names, so "sister moons" isn't 
completely correct (unless in the future, they've renamed them, which I 
seriousely doubt).﻿
top_comment.author: martijn van weele

comments.text:
+Aaron Bautista Now that's a can of worms right there. Don't actually 
"exist"? I just wrote it, you read it and then interpreted it, receiving a 
meaning from it. Also what is a word? A programmer would say it's nothing 
but a series of letters separated by spaces, you may also disagree with 
that.
You are right that people are prejudice and will read your degree 
professionality from your use of "correct" terminology. But people also 
aren't robots, you can talk naturally with them, and they will understand 
you. Which may or may not appeal to their emotional side, as well. It 
depends what you're trying to convey, and whom you're talking to.
comments.author: Peter Langmayr

comments.text:
+Peter Langmayr It isn't that I disagree with you, however I just want to 
share some advice. When attempting to persuade someone of your viewing of 
ideals, try not to use words that don't actually exist. For instance, 
"Ain't"
comments.author: Aaron Bautista

comments.text:
+martijn van weele
Because in English it doesn't matter. They are still moons, which should be 
treated as "she" despite being named after male Greek concepts/gods. In 
languages with grammatical gender, i.e. in which inanimate things are 
usually assigned a male or female (or sometimes neutral) gender, it's the 
norm to make this kind of construction.

In other words, treating a moon as "she" by saying "sister moons" is 
applying a grammatical gender to moons, and not a sexual gender (since they 
do not develop lady parts because of this). So the moons' names have 
nothing to do with this, see?
comments.author: Hugo Almeida

comments.text:
+Erik Lubben Then explain to me why they gave some planets and moons male 
names? By your logic they wouldn't do that.
comments.author: martijn van weele

comments.text:
"Linguistically" it is correct. English usually categorizes inanimate 
objects as feminine. This is why we usually call various ships "she" or 
"her", in Syntax, trees are created with "mother-daughter" nodes, the 
phrase "she's gonna blow" when referring to a volcano or some shit like 
that. I can't think of a single instance of male categorization. Also even 
if this weren't the case, it would still be considered correct. As Peter 
said "It IS correct simply because most people use it that way." 

Pedantry kills

Source: am linguist
comments.author: Erik Lubben

comments.text:
+Peter Langmayr Maybe I should have been more specific: linguistically it 
isn't correct, however, as you correctly state, esthetically it is better. 
But I think in my comment, however subtile, I gave a good alternative 
(should they want to refer to them in another video again): the twin moons 
of Mars. Of course it is possible that they have been renamed in the 
future, but if so, the rules of science would have to be changed, for they 
state that once you name your discovery, it cannot be changed (could just 
be biology and paleontology, in that case: my mistake), that is why for 
example the dinosaurs are still called dinosaurs, even though we now know 
that most of them weren't all that terrifying (deinos (ancient Greek)= 
terrifying), and they definitely weren't lizards (sauros (ancient Greek)= 
lizard), they were reptiles.
comments.author: martijn van weele

comments.text:
In this case it's Ecstatic over Logic. Brother planets just does not convey 
the same relationship as Sister planets, not to mention it sounds weird.
Saying it ain't completely correct ain't correct either. It IS correct 
simply because most people use it that way. Logic ain't always right.

captions.text:
By the cast of the sister moons of Mars she
rises, in answer to the beckoning of some

demented whisper from beyond the veil. A girl
and her horse slip through the night, across
the precipice of the infinite.
What? Where are we?
Beth awakens to find herself within a mysterious-
Horse? Are you talking?
Now Beth appears to be delusional.

My ears hear your horse thoughts! How is this
possible?

You can really hear me? There must be some
kind of brainwave conductive material
in the See-Through Zone!
See-Through Zone? You mean-

We must return at once. This timeless realm
is beyond my knowledge! I cannot protect you!

No! My dad is lost in here somewhere, and
I'm gonna rescue him!
Somehow this place is familiar.
Is this it? Did we find him?

This whole zone is some kind of computer program?
I have to jump. I'm going alone.
No. I am your horse. Mount me.
AAAAAAHHHHHHH!
Monty? Is that you?
Wha... who? Daddy?!

Oh, my mistake. Welcome Daughter, and Horse.
I'm Reverend Pickle Chips.
Dad! No you're not-
On to Step Two!
He thinks he's Ralph Waldo Pickle Chips?
I think your father has changed.

Dad, Catbug told us he'd found our parents,
but he didn't see you.

Sit! I was just making Zone porridge, the
good hard stuff!
But I came to bust you outta here.

There is no way out, daughter. I sent you
a door and you came and you belong here
with us.
Never doubt the worm - never doubt the worm.

We have to get you out of here now or - AAH!
What the hell? You eat this virus stuff?

The worm provides! His gut sack nourishes!
His walls protect!
Step Three: Pamphlet.
We stay warm with these old beach towels.
Wait, uh--
Read!
Yes sir.

Whoa, you got a testimonial from President
Fishhead?

The worm operates at a level of intelligence
more advanced than you and I can imagine.

His sublime will penetrates minds in the highest
seats of power. For me, the cost of his guidance
is the sacrifice of a virgin and a horse.
That's us!

...Or maybe a virgin horse? There's no comma
on that line, could be a typo.

I'm afraid we're in the belly of the Aeon
Worm, a reviled goliath of the highest evolution.
And the See-Through Zone is his prison!

This place holds every creature your father
defeated as leader of the Courageous Battlers.

I haven't seen those guys since the Worm
ate me.
Reverend?! You fought against our lord?

That was before your time, Clemency. Never
doubt the worm.
Never doubt the worm.
Hmf. This guy is fuh-reakyyy!

My knowledge of the natural world is so vast
that I can't move my-
Beth, look! Look!

Holy goat!
The Zone has imbued me with telekinesis! I'm
moving the leg with my mind!

Right, left, right, left! Ha! Ha-ha! I can
walk!
Yeah!

I can go over here and over here and up and
down and up and kick and kick and bend!
Wohaa-ha! Yeeee! You are full of surprises!

I got this note that said Ralph Waldo Pickle
Chips is the key, but-
It's the name He chose for me.
Ha ha! Freedom!
I am the key to your salvation.
Prancing! I'm prancing, Beth!

Now that you two are here we're a family
again and my vile lord is appeased!
Everybody wins.
Dad, shouldn't we be escaping?
(angry growling)
Never doubt the worm!
Never doubt the worm!

See what you've done? He's on the warpath
now.

Beth, even if you could escape our lord, the
door I sent was designed to vanish after opening.
It may already be gone.

What?? No, um - maybe I can get the Worm to
spit us out!
I'll have Clemency make up the guest beds!
His brainstem is so... turgid!

I can't lose you again, but staying here
is just not an option.

Beth Tezuka. Stop being selfish at once and
accept your vile destiny!
I... yes sir. We'll stay with you.
What's that now?
Good... that's my girl-

Sorry Dad, but I'm having serious doubts
about the Worm!
(angry growl)
Progress?!
I got nothin'!
Never doubt the - HUNGH!!!
Okay. Math, it's just math... Got it!
(monstrous growl)

The Aeon Worm must not follow us through!
It's a threat to all existence!
What's happening?

Do not look back! Its grotesque splendor is
more than human minds can endure!
It's too fast!

Fear not! The power of the zone compels me!
Form psychic Horse armor! Form psychic crown!
And a mean-ass hair-do! And a beard!
We're gonna die, Horse!
Oh right - Psychic Hooves of Fire!
Catbug!
Why are we running?!
Cross over while I hold him at bay!
No, you have to come with us!

I have emerged from the Void, finally able
to reach my destiny! I am super juiced to
protect you with my life! Go!

Swifter than the leopards! More fierce than
the evening wolves! Fear me, for when armored

by her love I possess the strength to fight
a GOD!
Wha--nnnnnaaaaaaahhhhh!
Woooh-haaaaa! Catbug!

What is all this racket when I'm trying
to make a mix tape!?
I fight so that she may go on.
For I... am just a horse.

title: Beth Goes Into the See Through Zone in "Aeon Worm" - (Bravest Warriors Season 2 Ep. 1)
